basic.floral_language:
Sedum spurium 
Floriography: perseverance, lovely, beautiful
Sedum spurium has a shape of a flower with many branches, oval and green leaves with wavy edge and smooth surfaces. With abundant sunlight, leaves or even the whole plant turn bright red. Strong reproductive ability, may plant alone. 
Likes sunny places, no apparent dormancy. Flowers sometimes, mostly in summer. Flowers are rose red.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, rose red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny leaf color turning to dark red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, no apparent period of dormancy
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
